PREPARING TO GET/SEND VALUES.

1. Download the latest version of the Server Emulator (v0.44)
2. Use WinRAR to extract the contents of the archive into the game directory.

SABOTAGING COMMUNICATION WITH THE UBISOFT SERVERS.

4. Open Notepad as an Admin and then open the following file "C:\windows\system32\drivers\etc\hosts".
5. Add the following lines of code to the bottom of the host file document and hit "File > Save".

Code: Select all | Line number On/Off | Expand/Contract

   1. 127.0.0.1 static3.cdn.ubi.com
   2. 127.0.0.1 ubisoft-orbit.s3.amazonaws.com
   3. #127.0.0.1 onlineconfigservice.ubi.com
   4. 127.0.0.1 orbitservice.ubi.com
   5. #127.0.0.1 ubisoft-orbit-savegames.s3.amazonaws.com
6. Open your game directory again and run the Emulator by double clicking the "server.exe" executable.
7. Run the game and wait till the Ubisoft Game Launcher is about to launch the game.
8. Click the small cogwheel at the top right of the launcher window and turn off online cloud saving.

** Use an existing Ubisoft account to login to the Ubisoft Launcher! **

It's just that you need to tell your antivirus program to ignore the ubiorbitapi_r2.dll file.

If you use AVG: Go to Resident Shield > Manage Exceptions, and add ubiorbitapi_r2.dll to 'Excluded files', and the gamepath to the 'Resident Shield Directory Excludes' list.

About main menu problem - if you have an ati card, follow these steps:

- Open the 'Catalyst control Center
- Go to 'Graphics' at the top and select '3d'
- Go to 'AA' and make sure that 'Use application settings' is put on
- Do the same with 'AF'
